channel.title: Comments on: Mashpi: a cocoon in an Ecuadorian cloud forest

item.title: By: David Brito
item.dc:creator: David Brito
item.description:
It is one of the best places in South America to stay! great experience. Anyway, in Mindo near Mashpi, and only 1 hour and 30 minutes from Quito you can find cheaper places with similar experience :)
regards
David
item.content:encoded:
It is one of the best places in South America to stay! great experience. Anyway, in Mindo near Mashpi, and only 1 hour and 30 minutes from Quito you can find cheaper places with similar experience ðŸ™‚

regards

David

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/mashpi-a-cocoon-in-an-ecuadorian-cloud-forest/#comment-159673">Leanne</a>.
It is a luxury lodge and it is quite pricey but I definitely think it's worth it for those bedrooms, the food, the guides and to be paying towards the conservation of that beautiful forest.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Leanne.

It is a luxury lodge and it is quite pricey but I definitely think it’s worth it for those bedrooms, the food, the guides and to be paying towards the conservation of that beautiful forest.

item.title: By: Leanne
item.dc:creator: Leanne
item.description: Beautiful! And I thought I lived near a lot of trees. That is quite a view! How expensive was that? Do you think it was worth it?
item.content:encoded: Beautiful! And I thought I lived near a lot of trees. That is quite a view! How expensive was that? Do you think it was worth it?
